description: Inspects the text of a batch of documents for named entities and returns information about them. For more information about named entities, see Entities in the Comprehend Developer Guide.

parameters.name: TextList
parameters.description: A list containing the UTF-8 encoded text of the input documents. The list can contain a maximum of 25 documents. The maximum size of each document is 5 KB. (string) ---

parameters.name: LanguageCode
parameters.description: The language of the input documents. You can specify any of the primary languages supported by Amazon Comprehend. All documents must be in the same language.

nested_items.name: ResultList
nested_items.description: A list of objects containing the results of the operation. The results are sorted in ascending order by the Index field and match the order of the documents in the input list. If all of the documents contain an error, the ResultList is empty.

nested_items.name: Index
nested_items.description: The zero-based index of the document in the input list.

nested_items.name: Entities
nested_items.description: One or more  Entity objects, one for each entity detected in the document.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend has in the accuracy of the detection.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The entity type. For entity detection using the built-in model, this field contains one of the standard entity types listed below.

nested_items.name: Text
nested_items.description: The text of the entity.

nested_items.name: BeginOffset
nested_items.description: The zero-based offset from the beginning of the source text to the first character in the entity.

nested_items.name: EndOffset
nested_items.description: The zero-based offset from the beginning of the source text to the last character in the entity.

nested_items.name: BlockReferences
nested_items.description: A reference to each block for this entity. This field is empty for plain-text input.

nested_items.name: BlockId
nested_items.description: Unique identifier for the block.

nested_items.name: BeginOffset
nested_items.description: Offset of the start of the block within its parent block.

nested_items.name: EndOffset
nested_items.description: Offset of the end of the block within its parent block.

nested_items.name: ChildBlocks
nested_items.description: List of child blocks within this block.

nested_items.name: ChildBlockId
nested_items.description: Unique identifier for the child block.

nested_items.name: BeginOffset
nested_items.description: Offset of the start of the child block within its parent block.

nested_items.name: EndOffset
nested_items.description: Offset of the end of the child block within its parent block.

nested_items.name: ErrorList
nested_items.description: A list containing one object for each document that contained an error. The results are sorted in ascending order by the Index field and match the order of the documents in the input list. If there are no errors in the batch, the ErrorList is empty.

nested_items.name: Index
nested_items.description: The zero-based index of the document in the input list.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The numeric error code of the error.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: A text description of the error.
